::Hot Rod::

"Hot Rod, maximize." Hot Rod turns to his bot mode. The damage wasnt to
bad, in that mode.
"The Ark should be under attack by now, we have to get there."
Hot Rod starts running, towards the Ark.

::DrillBit::

DrillBit continues to derill.
